title: Reawakened Flames
description: Previously published as "Rise" by Lindsay McCafferty. Aria, the young crown princess of Toranon, has the world at her feet and a bright future ahead of her. Then, she develops mental illness and finds herself trapped in a fight that she feels is a losing battle with only one path of escape. At the same time, Landa, who will one day become the leader of the phoenixes, has an embarrassing accident and afterwards, struggles with her confidence and self-esteem, causing her to lose the one ability she wields as a phoenix, her fire. With dark forces on the move, Aria and Landa find themselves battling their own inner struggles while trying to save Toranon from utter ruin. Along the way, the two face a far more sinister evil that tests their courage and determination to rise above their situations that they believe are hopeless.
author: Lindsay McCafferty
